channel.title: How to change rune-warfare client port?
channel.description:
Hi. I'm using rune-warfare source/client and don't know how to change client's port to 5555. I had change it my why but it doesn't shows enymore screenshot button so please help my with this/
Client download link: http://www.upload.ee/files/187010/The_Official_Rune-Warfare_Client.rar.html [br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 04, 2009, 03:03:12 pm[/size][hr]Eh never mind I allready find it. sorry for threat. If Anybody needs it post here and i will add copy/paste how to make it work.

item.title: How to change rune-warfare client port?
